thread.title: South China Sea: US carrier group begins 'routine' patrols - BBC News
thread.title_full: South China Sea: US carrier group begins 'routine' patrols - BBC News

title: South China Sea: US carrier group begins 'routine' patrols - BBC News
text:
Image copyright AFP Image caption The USS Carl Vinson is no stranger to the region US aircraft carrier the USS Carl Vinson has started what it calls "routine operations" in the South China Sea, with a fleet of supporting warships. 
The deployment comes days after China's foreign ministry warned Washington against challenging Beijing's sovereignty in the region. 
China claims several contested shoals, islets and reefs in the area. 
It has been constructing artificial islands with airstrips in the South China Sea for a number of years. Image copyright Reuters Image caption China has built islands on reefs and, says a think tank, is building military facilities on some
